unnormalised: Yeah, I saw Dr. Sharma's paper on AI ethics, quite insightful. Prof. Banerjee also had some interesting points during the seminar. I think Mr. Patel from TCS also mentioned something similar in his keynote last month, maybe related? Would be cool to see how these ideas connect.
normalised: Yeah, I saw Doctor Sharma's paper on A-I ethics, quite insightful. Professor Banerjee also had some interesting points during the seminar. I think Mister Patel from T-C-S also mentioned something similar in his keynote last month, maybe related? Would be cool to see how these ideas connect.
